titleStmt.title: The great duty of communicating explain'd and enforc'd, the objections against it answer'd, and the necessary preparation for it stated With devotions to be us'd before, at, and after the Lord's Supper. By the author of The duties of the closet.
titleStmt.author: Dawes, William, Sir, 1671-1724.

titleStmt.title: The great duty of communicating explain'd and enforc'd, the objections against it answer'd, and the necessary preparation for it stated With devotions to be us'd before, at, and after the Lord's Supper. By the author of The duties of the closet.
titleStmt.author: Dawes, William, Sir, 1671-1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Speed, over against Jonathan's coffee-house, in Exchange Alley, Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Below imprint: Price 3d. but 20s. a hundred to those who give them away.
Author of The duties of the closet = Sir William Dawes.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library, London, England.
